thread.title: Regents vote for $700K Gib Arnold settlement
thread.title_full: Regents vote for $700K Gib Arnold settlement

title: Regents vote for $700K Gib Arnold settlement
text:
UH regents vote for $700K settlement with Gib Arnold UPDATED 1:57 PM HST Oct 15, 2015 A Large Text Photos 
The University of Hawaii Board of Regents voted Thursday to pay former head basketball coach Gib Arnold $700,000 in a settlement. Related Ganot named UH men's basketball head... 
Arnold was fired without cause almost a year ago. The school had already agreed to pay Arnold the balance of his $344,000 salary through 2015. 
The regents voted to pay him $700,000 more due to a clause in his contract. We'll have a full report on KITV4 News at 5 and 6.
